• Mobile-optimized controls with D-pad and action buttons for portrait and landscape modes
  • Real-time multiplayer using MQTT protocol with host election and map synchronization
  • Procedural world generation with dynamic daylight cycle, sky color transitions, and celestial bodies
  • Upgrades system including drill tiers, hull capacity, fuel capacity, cargo space, heat resistance, and X-ray vision
  • Teleporter network for fast travel and explosive mechanics (TNT, Nuke) for large-scale mining
    const TILE_TYPES = { EMPTY: 0, DIRT: 1, GRASS: 2, STONE: 3, HARD_STONE: 4, DEEP_SLATE: 5,
    COAL: 6, IRON: 7, GOLD: 8, DIAMOND: 9, EMERALD: 10, RUBY: 11, CASING: 20, BEDROCK: 99 };

MMO mining game featuring real-time multiplayer, procedural world generation, and mobile controls. Players explore an infinite underground world, mine resources, upgrade their equipment, and interact with others through chat and trading systems. The game includes a dynamic day/night cycle, weather effects, and a shop system for purchasing upgrades and items.
